modName: Altered Masque of Clavicus Vile Armor Classes
summary: The Masque is now light armor or clothing.
descriptionHtml: As requested, the Masque of Clavicus Vile is now either light armor or clothing... come on, do I really have to explain this? :) As usual, only pick one. The armor value has not changed because I can\'t think of how to balance it, so it\'s still a base rating of 23.00, except the clothing option which is 0.
author: Oneiros
